comments.author: Christine Poerschke
comments.content: attaching proposed patch against trunk (the patch was generated from git, when applying the patch I would use 'svn cp' also to preserve the log history of the code factored out into new classes)

comments.author: Christine Poerschke
comments.content:
Splitting patch into two parts for easier and clearer handling:

	part 1: factor out StrParser from QueryParsing.StrParser
	part 2: factor out SortSpecParsing[Test] from QueryParsing[Test] (both QueryParsing and SortSpecParsing use the StrParser class)
